description: These burgers are all about the wow factor. Treat yourself to restaurant-style smoky pulled pork burgers at home with this easy slow cooker recipe.
name: SlowCooker Pulled Pork Rolls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2.3 kg Woolworths boneless roast pork shoulder
12 Woolworths bread rolls extra soft jumbo

recipeInstructions.text: Place coleslaw, pork, cucumber, chilli and coriander on roll bases. Sandwich with roll tops and serve
